sourcesContent:
'use client' import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" import { API_URL } from "../config" import { MapPin, DollarSign, User, Clock, ChevronLeft, Tractor } from "lucide-react" import BookingForm from "../components/booking/BookingForm" import { formatCurrency } from "../utils/format" const EquipmentDetail = () => { const { id } = useParams() const [equipment, setEquipment] = useState(null) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [error, setError] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { const fetchEquipmentDetail = async () => { try { setLoading(true) const res = await axios.get(`${API_URL}/api/equipment/${id}`) setEquipment(res.data) setError(null) } catch (err) { setError("Failed to load equipment details") console.error(err) } finally { setLoading(false) } } fetchEquipmentDetail() }, [id]) // ✅ WhatsApp Message Function const handleMessageOwner = (phoneNumber) => { if (!phoneNumber) { alert("Owner phone number not available") return } const formattedNumber = phoneNumber.replace(/^(\+91|0)/, '') const whatsappURL = `https://wa.me/91${formattedNumber}?text=Hi, I'm interested in your equipment listed on AgroVerse.` window.open(whatsappURL, '_blank') } if (loading) { return (
) } if (error || !equipment) { return (

{error || "Equipment not found"}

Back to Equipment
) } return (
Back to Equipment
{!equipment.isAvailable && (
Not Available
)}
{equipment.category}

{equipment.name}

{equipment.location}
{formatCurrency(equipment.pricePerDay)}/day
Owner: {equipment.owner?.name || "Anonymous"}
Listed {new Date(equipment.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}

Description

{equipment.description}

Specifications

{equipment.specifications && Object.entries(equipment.specifications).map(([key, value]) => (
{key}: {value}
))}
{equipment.terms && (

Terms & Conditions

{equipment.terms}

)}

Contact Owner

Have questions about this equipment? Contact the owner directly.

) } export default EquipmentDetail
